== Writing Vim Plugins in Python ==
=== The Python Interfaces to VIM ===
*   see :h python in Vim
*   "vim" moudle
The vim module implements two methods, three constants, and one error object.
    *   vim.command(str)
    *   vim.eval(str)
    *   vim.error
    *   vim.buffers
    *   vim.windows
    *   vim.current
